price: Àti pé A ti kọ ọ́ sínú àwọn ìpín-ìpín Tírà (tí A sọ̀kalẹ̀) lẹ́yìn (èyí tí ó wà nínú) Tírà Ìpìlẹ̀ (ìyẹn, Laohul- Mahfūṭḥ) pé dájúdájú ilẹ̀ (ìyẹn ilẹ̀ Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra),¹ àwọn ẹrúsìn Mi, àwọn ẹni rere, ni wọn yóò jogún rẹ̀.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ أَنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِيَ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ
footnotes: 1. Ìtúmọ̀ yìí wà ní ìbámu sí sūrah az-Zumọr; 39:74.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad katabnā fī al-zabūri min baʿdi al-dhik'ri anna al-arḍa yarithuhā ʿibādiya al-ṣāliḥūna
